thread.title: President visits Pandith Amaradewa (The President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka)
thread.title_full: President visits Pandith Amaradewa (The President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: President visits Pandith Amaradewa (The President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka)
text: ( Source : The President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka ) President Maithripala Sirisena on Saturday (Oct. 3) visited the residence of music maestro Pandith W.D. Amaradeva in Maharagama and inquired into his well being.
